text: Niścaẏa āllāhē tōmālōkaka bahu kṣētrata sahāẏa karaichē ārau hunā'inara yud'dhara dinā yētiẏā tōmālōkaka uṯphulla karaichila tōmālōkara saṅkhyāgaraiṣṭhatā'i, kintu sēẏā tōmālōkara kōnō kāmata ahā nāchila ārau pr̥thiraī praśasta hōraā satbē'ō tōmālōkara bābē saṅkīrṇa hai gaichila. Tāra pichata tōmālōkē pr̥ṣṭha pradarśana karai palāẏana karaichilā
